description: An educational game about endangered species in Agder, Norway titled 'Red Listed - Survival with AI Guardian'. Features a Leaflet map with interactive animal points, an AI chatbot 'Naturens Vokter' (Nature's Guardian) that answers questions about local nature and animals, day/streak system, nature health bar, achievements, leaderboard, difficulty selection, and satellite/standard map toggle. Includes 400+ animal images for the species database.
